name: Under the Light
description:
In this game you solve puzzles by using the two main mechanics of the game:
A device that lets you mark two points in the room in order to create a traversable light bridge between them and a pair of gravity reversing boots.

Combine those two with an underground laboratory and a cavern and you have a game world full of possibilities and things to explore!

Approximate game time: 30 minutes

Controls: MovementW A S D and Space Create Light Bridges
Left Mouse Button x2
First click marks the bridge start (left indicator glows), Second click marks the bridge end (right indicator glows)
Break Light Bridge
Q Reverse Gravity
Shift
Place Secondary Crystal
Right Mouse Button
